## Description {#details}

A range adaptor for a pair of iterators.

This just wraps two iterators into a range-compatible interface. Nothing fancy at all.

Definition at line 42 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/iterator-range-h">iterator&#95;range.h</a>.
